info.title: Chapter
info.description: An Chapter entity storing a chapter properties and a list of verses.

id.description: The unique chapter identifier being md5 created from a concatenation of a testament reference, a tome reference and a chapter number values.

testament.description: The testament reference. It can be an 'Old Testament' or a 'New Testament'.

tome.description: The tome reference in the form of siglum, e.g. 'Mt'.

number.description: The chapter cardinal number in context of a tome.

verses.description: The list of verses being a content of a specific chapter.

Verse.description: The Verse entity (child of Chapter entity).

id.description: The unique verse identifier being md5 created from a concatenation of a testament reference, a tome reference, a chapter number and a verse number values.

number.description: The verse cardinal number in context of a chapter.

supplements.description: The list of supplement identifiers connected with a specific verse
